revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Intel Galileo Gen 2 Board]] to [[Intel Galileo Board (Gen 2)]]: fixed ;
revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Intel |model=Galileo |revision=Board (Gen 2) |upc=735858289788 |ean=5032037068703 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (06/19/2017) |price=80 |est_release_date=07/2014 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=7-15 |pwr_amp=1-2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Quark |cpu1_model=X1000 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M8JP-125:G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=National Semiconductor |eth_chip2_model=DP83848 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=8Kb I2C EEPROM;OnSemi;CAT24C08HU4I;;1;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection Array;OnSemi;CM1230_02CP;;6;,,, 16bit I2C-bus I/O Port w/Interrupt;NXP;PCAL9535A;;3;,,, 16-Channel 12-bit PWM I2C-bus LED Controller;NXP;PCA9685;;1;,,, 8-Channel 500kSPS to 1 MSPS 10-Bit A/D Converter;TI;ADC108S102;;1;,,, 3.6V 4A Integrated Load Switch w/ Controlled Turn-on;TI;TPS22920;;5;,,, 3-17V 3A Step-Down Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS62130;;1;,,, 4.5-16V Synchronous Step Down Three DC/DC Converter w/ FET;TI;TPS652510;;1;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051B;;1;,,, Octal Buffer/Driver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LV541AT;;2;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74VL125A;;3;,,, Quadruple Buffer/Line Driver w/ 3-State Input/Output;NXP;74LVC126A;;3;,,, 1-Î© 2-Channel SPDT Analog Switch;TI;TS5A23159;;2;,,, Single 2-input Multiplexer;NXP;74LVC1G157;;11; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC, Arduino expansion |stock_boot=Grub;0.97; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.7;Poky 9.0.2;Yocto Project 1.4; |default_user=root |default_pass=blank |oui_eth=98:4F:EE }} {{TagLine|Intel Galileo Gen 2 Board}} :[https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/83137/intel-galileo-gen-2-board.html Product page] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intel_Galileo ''Intel Galileo'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/07/16/intel-announces-galileo-gen-2-development-board-based-on-quark-soc/ ''Intel Announces Galileo Gen 2 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/intel-unveils-second-generation-galileo-hacker-sbc/ ''Intel unveils second generation Galileo hacker SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel]]'' Quark X1000 @400MHz :Single-Core 32-bit X86 *Memory: 256MB (DRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 8MB NOR flash, 8KB EEPROM, :and micro SD card (up to 32GB) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet Port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host, 1x micro USB 2.0 device port *Expansion: Arduino compatible headers *Power Source: 5V/1.5A via USB Type-C ==Images== ---- File:Intel Galileo Gen 2 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Intel Galileo Gen 2 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
